name: Assassin’s Creed Black Flag Gold Edition
name_original: Assassin’s Creed Black Flag Gold Edition
description: It is 1715. Pirates rule the Caribbean, terrorizing navies & humiliating empires. From sinking warships to conquering fortresses, Captain Edward Kenway stopped at nothing to earn his fortune & legend. Yet, the adventures of his first mate have never been revealed. Until now. Get the game & the Season Pass now for the chance to play as Edward’s first mate, who will take you even deeper into the real explosive events of the Golden Age of Pirates.
